mapper.select: SELECT A.RETROSPECT_CODE , A.SPRINT_CODE , B.SPRINT_TITLE FROM TBL_RETROSPECTIVE A JOIN TBL_SPRINT B ON (A.SPRINT_CODE = B.SPRINT_CODE) WHERE B.SPRINT_PROGRESS = '완료' AND B.PROJECT_CODE = #{ projectCode } AND B.SPRINT_DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.RETROSPECT_CODE , A.SPRINT_CODE , A.RETROSPECTIVE_BODY , A.RETROSPECTIVE_WRITING_TIME , A.RETROSPECTIVE_DELETE_STATUS FROM TBL_RETROSPECTIVE_COMMENT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.SPRINT_CODE = #{ code } AND A.SPRINT_DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RETROSPECTIVE_COMMENT A ( A.MEMBER_NO , A.RETROSPECTIVE_BODY , A.RETROSPECTIVE_WRITING_TIME , A.RETROSPECTIVE_DELETE_STATUS , A.SPRINT_CODE , A.RETROSPECT_CODE ) VALUES ( #{ memberNo } , #{ body } , SYSDATE , 'N' , (SELECT B.SPRINT_CODE FROM TBL_RETROSPECTIVE B WHERE B.RETROSPECT_CODE = #{ code }) , #{ code } )
mapper.select: SELECT A.RETROSPECT_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.RETROSPECTIVE_BODY , A.RETROSPECTIVE_WRITING_TIME , A.RETROSPECTIVE_DELETE_STATUS , A.SPRINT_CODE FROM TBL_RETROSPECTIVE_COMMENT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.RETROSPECT_CODE = #{ code } AND A.RETROSPECTIVE_DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
